doc.title: Her Vietnam
doc.plot: Captain Nancy Reeves, a nurse with the Army Nurse Corp, faces her last few days of service during the Vietnam conflict. When Jess Ballard, a brash combat journalist, arrives at the medical base to do a story on Captain Reeves and her staff, Nancy realizes she has to come to grips with the realities of leaving this life behind and returning to her family back in the states. But the last few days in a war zone are never easy, and when the base falls under attack from a Viet Cong ambush Nancy experiences a series of events which will forever change her life.
